casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Christopher WILEY, Defendant-Appellee. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
William Rucker, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158019, SC: 158020
COA: 336898, COA: 338870 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 28, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on September 21, 2018, is accepted as timely filed.
